text: Basic Instinct 2 (also known as Basic Instinct 2: Risk Addiction) is a 2006 German Spanish British American erotic thriller movie directed by Michael Caton-Jones and starring Sharon Stone, David Morrissey, Charlotte Rampling, David Thewlis. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. == Other websites == * * Category:2006 thriller movies Category:2000s erotic movies Category:2000s psychological movies Category:English-language movies Category:American erotic movies Category:American thriller movies Category:American sequel movies Category:British thriller movies Category:German thriller movies Category:Spanish thriller movies Category:Antisocial personality disorder in fiction Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Caton-Jones Category:Movies set in London Category:Movies composed by John Murphy
title: Basic Instinct 2
